# What to know

1) How to calculate the fundamental frequency from a waveform of a complex periodic sound
2) How to calculate the wavelength and period of a sound given a frequency
3) The relationship between the fundamental frequency and higher harmonics of a complex periodic sound
4) How to read a line spectrum of a complex periodic sound
